channel.title: Talks on StatWizard
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on StatWizard

item.title: Reviewing Robust Location and Scatter Estimators
item.description: This is an invited session given to the graduate students of Indian Statistical Insitute, Kolkata in a course on Robust Statistics

item.title: Algorithmic Fairness of Statistical Decision Systems
item.description: This is a talk that I presented during the final year of my M.Stat. at Indian Statistical Institute, for the PCM Memorial Gold Medal Presentation. In this talk, I discussed the fairness aspect of the statistical decision systems, various ethical issues associated with the automated statistical systems which are designed to take crucial decisions, and how to quantify these seemingly qualitative aspect of those systems.

item.title: tSNE: A way to visualize multidimensional data
item.description: This is a talk I gave during the D. Basu Gold Medal Award Ceremony in Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata.
